title: Sky-High Morocco Five-Star Retreat within Iconic Casablanca Centre
description: Modern Moroccan luxury meets Moorish majesty at the five-star Kenzi Tower Hotel, perfectly positioned overlooking Casablanca’s historic streets and the shining Atlantic Sea. Inhabiting 28 floors of the iconic Casablanca Twin Center, there’s no better place to explore the city’s countless charms, including the nearby Maarif Quarter and Hassan II Mosque. Retreat to classic French plates and sky-high views at Sens, or light bites at the sophisticated Tea & Champagne Lounge.
offer_address: Casablanca Twin Center, Bd Mohamed Zerktouni, Casablanca 21000, Morocco
